channel.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 on Microsoft 365 Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CLI for Microsoft 365 on Microsoft 365 Community Blog

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.2
item.description: We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.1
item.description: Manage Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross-platform CLI that allows you to manage various configuration settings of Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects no matter which operating system or shell you use.

item.title: PnP PowerShell or CLI for Microsoft 365 or both or other
item.description: During my SP consultant/dev work I most of the times used the last two. From time to time I got the question: which one is better?

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 on your mobile
item.description: CLI for Microsoft 365 is a cross platform command line tool you may use to manage many things. To name a few, you may manage OneDrive, Planner, Power Apps and Automate, Teams, Yammer, SharePoint (of course), now there is even a dedicated command to help you set up Viva. The list keeps on growing and growing
